response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $800,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer, so we can discuss the details further. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
